column2: Well maintained, freshly painted 2-Family centrally located near bus lines, highways, colleges & restaurants.  Original details, built-ins, french doors & gleaming hardwoods throughout.  Tons of storage in basement & walk-up attic, washer dryer hookups in basement.  Updates include new windows (basement to attic) within 3 years, new roof 2017, gas HW heaters, gas stove & dishwasher in unit 1, back porch recently rebuilt.  Garage sold 'as is' & used by tenants upon request.  Agent related to seller
column3: Priced to sell! This amazing two family property in Albany's Hudson Park is perfect for owner occupant or investment. Constant income, separate utilities, 2 bedrooms and 1 bath in each unit. Seller is Motivated!
column4: Charming Center Square townhome w/garden apartment! The 2 BR/1.5BA two story owners unit features a beautiful open floor plan w/gleaming hardwood floors, exposed brick & beams. Cozy up to the gas stove in living / family room. Walk through French doors to a bright sun porch w/skylights & a private Sauna/shower room! Charm continues upstairs w/stained glass pocket doors & a wood stove! This home is complete w/a fenced-in yard & deck! Full 1BR/1BA garden level apartment great income to cover many expenses.
column5: Great Rental area between St Rose & SUNY Albany, downtown campus. Always rented - looks much better on the inside than the outside. Excellent rents.
column6: Ideal for the owner occupier or college rental investor. Nestled on a quiet street in West Albany. This 2 family home features spacious bedrooms, detached garage, a new roof, large basement perfect for storage and so much more.
column7: Fully renovated two family with spacious 3 bedroom on first floor. Great 1 bedroom in basement with back door entrance. Everything has been done here. New roof, siding, deck, fenced in back yard, windows, kitchens, bathrooms, flooring and driveway. A must see! Quiet neighborhood, close to parks, shops and restaurants!
column8: PRIME LOCATION!!!  This 2 Family has been recently updated by the current owners.  Not your typical apartment set up.  Absolutely HUGE layout for both apartments make this ideal for owner occupy buyers or a solid investment for the buyer looking to add a quality property to there portfolio.  1st floor has access to the finished basement that adds a ton of value to the property and possibly can be converted back to a 3 unit if desired and if approved by the city. 2nd floor flat is modern with a ton of charm.
column9: GREAT OWNER OCCUPIED OR INVESTORS. GREAT RENTS FOR A PRIME LOCATION TWO FAMILY. THREE CAR GARAGE COULD BRING ADDITIONAL INCOME - GARAGE DOORS TO BE REPLACED - TWO DAY NOTICE FOR SHOWINGS.
column10: Property is being offered on Xome. Do not disturb the tenants. Please contact the Listing Agent for any questions.
column11: Large 2 fam with many updates & upgrades. Porches totally rebuilt - new supports, siding, windows, deck flooring & more. 2nd unit porch was enclosed & provides extra bonus rm. All BR's are very good size. Baths are updated with new flooring. Two new refrigerators. 100amp panel per unit with wiring upgrades. Fenced yard. Roof slides added, new range 1st unit. Wood & laminate flooring. Current ROP's in place. 2nd unit uses 3rd flr for extra living space. LOW taxes. Prior day notice a must due to pet & family.
column12: Solid 2 Family - Always rented. Separate utilities. 48 hour notice to show. Contact LA.
column13: Just Reduced! Charming two family on a corner lot; located in the Pine hills neighborhood. Excellent investment opportunity or owner occupy. Centrally located to hospitals, local businesses, the bus route and 3 car garage with off street parking make this home a must see.
